name: One helluva day
description:
The plot.
One Helluva Day is a point & click adventure in the style of "Lucas Arts" and In the tradition of "Day of the tentacle"". Inspired by games like "Sam & max hit the road" and "The Secret of monkey island".

Self-centered CEO trying to save his company from bankruptcy, forced to rescuing whole town from an evil curse.

Every character is a puzzle that can be solved or break.
There are two ways to solve.First one easy way.You just need to steal the object are needed to solve the puzzle or to cheat in order to solve the problem.Second is heavy path.Each character in the game has its own problems. Help in solving the problem of the character, the hero of the game will lead to solving the puzzle. But finding a solution will be difficult.

At the end of the story you will meet all the characters and all of your previous decisions affect what would be the final.

The game will be several completely different endings.Features
  • Classic point-and-click gameplay, featuring both pointing and clicking.
  • A variety of wacky puzzles.
  • Over 2000 lines of written dialog.
  • Interactive quirky characters each with own unique story.
  • Unique and peculiar hand drawn 2D Art-Style and 2D animation.
  • Original soundtrack.
